name: Robin no Hikou
description:
THE HIT VISUAL NOVEL FROM TEAM SALVATHOMAS

PLAY AS THE QUIET KID IN ROBIN'S CLASS AND DECIDE IT'S FINALLY TIME YOU MAKE YOUR MOVE. ATTEMPT TO GET CLOSER TO ROBIN OVER THE COURSE OF A DAY. IN A DAY FILLED WITH TREACHEROUS AND TREASONOUS CONVERSATIONS WITH YOUR FELLOW CLASSMATES, WHO, OR WHAT WILL YOU END UP AS?

DEFINITELY 9 MONTHS OF WORK NOT 6 DAYS
HAPPY BIRTHDAY ROBIN!!!!

TEAM SALVATHOMAS
